      • isCellAliveInGrid

        public static boolean isCellAliveInGrid​(info.gridworld.grid.Grid<info.gridworld.actor.Actor> grid,
                                        int row,
                                        int col)
        Returns true if the cell at the specified row and column in the specified grid is alive. Otherwise, returns false. Not intended to be invoked from other classes; only public to enable unit testing.
        Parameters:
        grid - the grid in which to check for a live cell
        row - the row (zero-based index) of the cell to check
        col - the column (zero-based index) of the cell to check
        Returns:
        true if the cell at the specified row and column is alive
